types.html:
en ce qui concerne

  1. concerning, as to, as far as ... is concerned
    Synonym: pour ce qui est de
    En ce qui me concerne, il y a plein de travail.
    As far as I'm concerned, there's plenty of work.
trans: concerning, as to, as far as ... is concerned

title: en ce qui concerne
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃ s(ə) ki kɔ̃.sɛʁn/
